concept.title: PGI 217.174 Multiyear contracts for electricity from renewable energy sources.

conbody.p: The business case analysis template and guidance for the head of the contracting activity determination to enter into a contract for a period in excess of 5 years is available here: Renewable Electricity Acquisition Business Case Analysis Template and Guidance.
